cases.title: Smith v Minister of Justice
cases.summary: This case involved a constitutional challenge to the procedural fairness of administrative detention under the Immigration Act.
precedents_cited: Minister of Home Affairs v Watchenuka 2004 (4) SA 326 (SCA)
Masetlha v President of the RSA 2008 (1) SA 566 (CC)

cases.title: Economic Freedom Fighters v Speaker of the National Assembly
cases.summary: The Court dealt with the legality of a motion of no confidence and the obligation of Parliament to hold the executive accountable.
precedents_cited: Doctors for Life International v Speaker of the National Assembly 2006 (6) SA 416 (CC)

cases.title: City of Cape Town v Rand Properties
cases.summary: This judgment clarified municipal obligations in terms of housing and evictions under the PIE Act.
precedents_cited: Occupiers of 51 Olivia Road v City of Johannesburg 2008 (3) SA 208 (CC)
Port Elizabeth Municipality v Various Occupiers 2005 (1) SA 217 (CC)
